home.aboutText1: Videography is my passion—I love capturing moments, emotions, and stories through moving images. My goal is to create creative and powerful videos that truly mean something to the viewer.
home.aboutText2: I studied Applied Computer Science at UCLL in Leuven. Thanks to my technical background, I can combine my creativity with technology. This helps me think of modern, smart solutions and take my video projects to the next level.
home.aboutText3: Whether it's cinematic shots, drone footage, or capturing events: I work on every project with an eye for detail, quality, and especially passion. For me, every video must tell a story—a story that takes the viewer along and stays with them.
home.cameraDesc: A full-frame mirrorless camera that offers excellent image quality, fast autofocus, and great low-light performance. Perfect for both photography and videography.
home.droneDesc: A compact yet powerful drone that delivers stunning aerial footage with 4K video and advanced flight features for unique perspectives.
home.visionText: I believe that videography is more than just capturing images—it's about telling stories, evoking emotions, and creating memories that last a lifetime. Every video I produce is a reflection of my dedication to craftsmanship and artistic expression.
